entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
